name: Alchemica: A Romance of Three Dimensions (Early Access)
name_original: Alchemica: A Romance of Three Dimensions (Early Access)
description:
An experiment turned disastrous has left the city of New Atlas rent into three dimensions. You must hire heroes to help the blundering Professor correct his miscalculations before the chaos spreads. Alchemica: A Romance of Three Dimensions is a grid based Tactical RPG like no other. Played over three parallel grids, the player can "planar shift" enemies and objects across the planes of existence to win the turn based combat.

What's New?

15/02/17 - Scroll bar added to feedback page, allowing for more space to write.

17/02/17 - Audio update; intro music and SFX added.
